summary.span: 提供一个用于客户端-服务器通信的流，该流使用安全套接字层 (SSL) 安全协议对服务器和（可选）客户端进行身份验证。

span.span: Provides a stream used for client-server communication that uses the Secure Socket Layer (SSL) security protocol to authenticate the server and optionally the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SSL 协议有助于为使用 传输的消息提供机密性和完整性检查。SSL protocols help to provide confidentiality and integrity checking for messages transmitted using an . 当在客户端和服务器之间传递敏感信息时，应使用 SSL 连接，如 提供的连接。An SSL connection, such as that provided by , should be used when communicating sensitive information between a client and a server. 使用 有助于防止任何人在网络上传输信息时，对其进行读取和篡改。Using an helps to prevent anyone from reading and tampering with information while it is in transit on the network. 实例使用创建 时提供的流来传输数据。An instance transmits data using a stream that you supply when creating the . 提供此基础流时，你可以指定是否关闭 也会关闭基础流。When you supply this underlying stream, you have the option to specify whether closing the also closes the underlying stream. 通常， 类与 和 类一起使用。Typically, the class is used with the and classes. 方法提供适合与 类一起使用的 。The method provides a suitable for use with the class. 创建 之后，必须对该服务器和客户端（可选）进行身份验证。After creating an , the server and optionally, the client must be authenticated. 服务器必须提供一个 X509 证书来建立其身份证明，并请求客户端也这样做。The server must provide an X509 certificate that establishes proof of its identity and can request that the client also do so. 使用 传输信息之前，必须执行身份验证。Authentication must be performed before transmitting information using an . 客户端使用同步 方法（将在身份验证完成之前一直阻止）或异步 方法（不会阻止等待身份验证完成）启动身份验证。Clients initiate authentication using the synchronous methods, which block until the authentication completes, or the asynchronous methods, which do not block waiting for the authentication to complete. 服务器使用同步 或异步 方法启动身份验证。Servers initiate authentication using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 客户端和服务器都必须启动身份验证。Both client and server must initiate the authentication. 身份验证由安全支持提供程序（SSPI）通道提供程序进行处理。The authentication is handled by the Security Support Provider (SSPI) channel provider. 在创建 时，通过指定 委托，为客户端提供控制服务器证书验证的机会。The client is given an opportunity to control validation of the server's certificate by specifying a delegate when creating an . 服务器还可以通过提供 委托来控制验证。The server can also control validation by supplying a delegate. 委托引用的方法包括远程方的证书和验证证书时遇到的任何错误。The method referenced by the delegate includes the remote party's certificate and any errors SSPI encountered while validating the certificate. 请注意，如果服务器指定委托，则无论服务器是否请求客户端身份验证，都将调用委托的方法。Note that if the server specifies a delegate, the delegate's method is invoked regardless of whether the server requested client authentication. 如果服务器未请求客户端身份验证，则服务器的委托方法将接收空证书，并收到空的证书错误数组。If the server did not request client authentication, the server's delegate method receives a null certificate and an empty array of certificate errors. 如果服务器要求客户端身份验证，则客户端必须指定一个或多个用于身份验证的证书。If the server requires client authentication, the client must specify one or more certificates for authentication. 如果客户端有多个证书，则客户端可以提供 委托，为服务器选择正确的证书。If the client has more than one certificate, the client can provide a delegate to select the correct certificate for the server. 客户端的证书必须位于当前用户的 "我的" 证书存储中。The client's certificates must be located in the current user's "My" certificate store. （SSL 版本2）协议不支持通过证书进行客户端身份验证。Client authentication via certificates is not supported for the (SSL version 2) protocol. 如果身份验证失败，则会收到 ， 不再可用。If the authentication fails, you receive a , and the is no longer useable. 你应关闭此对象并删除对它的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以收集它。You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector. 如果身份验证过程（也称为 SSL 握手）成功，则会建立服务器的标识（以及客户端（可选）），客户端和服务器可以使用 来交换消息。When the authentication process, also known as the SSL handshake, succeeds, the identity of the server (and optionally, the client) is established and the can be used by the client and server to exchange messages. 在发送或接收信息之前，客户端和服务器应检查 提供的安全服务和级别，以确定所选的协议、算法和强度是否满足其完整性和机密性要求。Before sending or receiving information, the client and server should check the security services and levels provided by the to determine whether the protocol, algorithms, and strengths selected meet their requirements for integrity and confidentiality. 如果当前设置不足，应关闭流。If the current settings are not sufficient, the stream should be closed. 您可以使用 "" 和 "" 属性来检查 提供的安全服务。You can check the security services provided by the using the and properties. 下表显示了一些元素，这些元素报告用于身份验证、加密和数据签名的加密设置。The following table shows the elements that report the cryptographic settings used for authentication, encryption and data signing. |元素Element|成员Members| |-------------|-------------| |用于对服务器和客户端（可选）进行身份验证的安全协议。The security protocol used to authenticate the server and, optionally, the client.| 属性和关联的 枚举。The property and the associated enumeration.| |密钥交换算法。The key exchange algorithm.| 属性和关联的 枚举。The property and the associated enumeration.| |消息完整性算法。The message integrity algorithm.| 属性和关联的 枚举。The property and the associated enumeration.| |消息机密性算法。The message confidentiality algorithm.| 属性和关联的 枚举。The property and the associated enumeration.| |所选算法的强度。The strengths of the selected algorithms.|、和 属性。The , , and properties.| 身份验证成功后，可以使用同步 或异步 方法发送数据。After a successful authentication, you can send data using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 您可以使用同步 或异步 方法接收数据。You can receive data using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 如果你指定到 应将基础流保持为打开状态，则在使用完后，你将负责关闭该流。If you specified to the that the underlying stream should be left open, you are responsible for closing that stream when you are done using it. > [!NOTE] > 如果创建 对象的应用程序使用普通用户的凭据运行，则应用程序将不能访问本地计算机存储区中安装的证书，除非已向用户显式授予权限。If the application that creates the object runs with the credentials of a Normal user, the application will not be able to access certificates installed in the local machine store unless permission has been explicitly given to the user to do so. 假设在从内部流引发一次时，与任何其他 的超时都将被其调用方视为致命的。 assumes that a timeout along with any other when one is thrown from the inner stream will be treated as fatal by its caller. 在超时后重复使用 实例将返回垃圾。Reusing a instance after a timeout will return garbage. 应用程序应 并在这些情况下引发异常。An application should the and throw an exception in these cases. 4.6 .NET Framework 包括一项新的安全功能，用于阻止连接的不安全密码和哈希算法。The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections. 默认情况下，通过 Api 使用 TLS/SSL （如 HttpClient、HttpWebRequest、FTPClient、System.net.mail.smtpclient、System.net.security.sslstream 等）和目标 .NET Framework 4.6 获取更安全的行为。Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as HttpClient, HttpWebRequest, FTPClient, SmtpClient, SslStream, etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default. 开发人员可能需要选择退出此行为，以便与现有的 SSL3 服务或具有 RC4 服务的 TLS 保持互操作性。Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services OR TLS w/ RC4 services. [本文](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494)介绍如何修改代码，以便禁用新行为。[This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled. 4.7 .NET Framework 增加了对未指定 TLS 版本的 SslStreams 进行身份验证的方法的新重载，而是使用定义为[SCHANNEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa380123.aspx)中的系统默认值的 TLS 版本。The .NET Framework 4.7 adds new overloads for the methods that authenticate SslStreams that do not specify a TLS version, but instead use the TLS version defined as the system default in [SCHANNEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa380123.aspx). 在应用中使用这些方法，以便能够在以后修改默认值，因为 TLS 版本的最佳实践随时间而变化，无需重新生成和重新部署应用。Use these methods in your app as a way to be able to later modify the defaults as TLS version best practice changes over time, without the need to rebuild and redeploy your app. 另请参阅[.NET Framework 的传输层安全性（TLS）最佳实践](~/docs/framework/network-programming/tls.md)。Also see [Transport Layer Security (TLS) best practices with the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/tls.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个使用 类来与客户端进行通信的 。The following code example demonstrates creating an that uses the class to communicate with clients. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你为 `leaveStreamOpen` 参数指定 `true` 时，关闭 对 `innerStream` 流不起任何作用;如果不再需要 `innerStream`，则必须将其显式关闭。When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it. `userCertificateValidationCallback` 委托的 `certificateErrors` 参数包含通道安全支持提供程序接口（SSPI）返回的任何 Windows 错误代码。The `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's `certificateErrors` argument contains any Windows error codes returned by the channel Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI). `userCertificateValidationCallback` 委托调用的方法的返回值决定了身份验证是否成功。The return value of the method invoked by the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate determines whether authentication succeeds. 调用 `userCertificateValidationCallback` 委托的方法时，已选择了安全协议和加密算法。The security protocol and cryptographic algorithms are already selected when the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's method is invoked. 你可以使用方法来确定所选的加密算法和优势是否足以满足你的应用程序的需求。You can use the method to determine whether the selected cryptographic algorithms and strengths are sufficient for your application. 如果不是，则该方法应返回 `false` 以防止创建 。If not, the method should return `false` to prevent the from being created. 如果未在 encryptionpolicy 的配置文件中指定值，则 默认为构造的 实例 。If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the defaults to for the instance that is constructed. 当加密策略设置为 时，需要使用 Null 密码。The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to . > [!NOTE] > 框架在创建时将缓存 SSL 会话，并在可能的情况下尝试重复使用缓存会话来执行新请求。The Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible. 尝试重复使用 SSL 会话时，框架使用 的第一个元素（如果有），或在 为空时尝试重用匿名会话。When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous sessions if is empty. > [!NOTE] > SSL 版本2协议不支持客户端证书。Client certificates are not supported in the SSL version 2 protocol. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 并启动身份验证的客户端部分。The following code example creates an and initiates the client portion of the authentication. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你为 `leaveStreamOpen` 参数指定 `true` 时，关闭 对 `innerStream` 流不起任何作用;如果不再需要 `innerStream`，则必须将其显式关闭。When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it. `userCertificateValidationCallback` 委托的 `certificateErrors` 参数包含通道安全支持提供程序接口（SSPI）返回的任何 Windows 错误代码。The `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's `certificateErrors` argument contains any Windows error codes returned by the channel Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI). `userCertificateValidationCallback` 委托调用的方法的返回值决定了身份验证是否成功。The return value of the method invoked by the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate determines whether authentication succeeds. 调用 `userCertificateValidationCallback` 委托的方法时，已选择了安全协议和加密算法。The security protocol and cryptographic algorithms are already selected when the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's method is invoked. 你可以使用方法来确定所选的加密算法和优势是否足以满足你的应用程序的需求。You can use the method to determine whether the selected cryptographic algorithms and strengths are sufficient for your application. 如果不是，则该方法应返回 `false` 以防止创建 。If not, the method should return `false` to prevent the from being created. 当你的应用程序具有多个证书并且必须动态选择证书时，`userCertificateSelectionCallback` 委托非常有用。The `userCertificateSelectionCallback` delegate is useful when your application has multiple certificates and must dynamically choose a certificate. "我的" 存储区中的证书被传递给委托调用的方法。Certificates in the "MY" store are passed to the method invoked by the delegate. 如果未在 encryptionpolicy 的配置文件中指定值，则 默认为构造的 实例 。If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the defaults to for the instance that is constructed. 当加密策略设置为 时，需要使用 Null 密码。The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to . > [!NOTE] > 框架在创建时将缓存 SSL 会话，并在可能的情况下尝试重复使用缓存会话来执行新请求。The Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible. 尝试重用 SSL 会话时，框架使用 P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates 的第一个元素（如果有），或尝试在 P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates 为空时重用匿名会话。When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous sessions if P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates is empty. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此构造函数。The following code example demonstrates calling this constructor. 此示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[NclSslClientAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclSslClientAsync/CPP/NclSslClientAsync.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclSslClientAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclSslClientAsync/CS/clientasync.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NclSslClientAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclSslClientAsync/VB/clientasync.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[sslprotocols-none](~/includes/sslprotocols-none-md.md)] 不会在身份验证中使用客户端证书。No client certificates are used in the authentication. 身份验证期间，不会检查证书吊销列表。The certificate revocation list is not checked during authentication. 为 `targetHost` 指定的值必须与服务器证书上的名称匹配。The value specified for `targetHost` must match the name on the server's certificate. 当身份验证成功时，必须检查 和 属性，以确定 使用哪些安全服务。When authentication succeeds, you must check the and properties to determine what security services are used by the . 检查 属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。Check the property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred. 如果身份验证失败，则会收到 ，此 不再可用。If the authentication fails, you receive a , and this is no longer useable. 你应关闭此对象并删除对它的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以收集它。You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[sslprotocols-none](~/includes/sslprotocols-none-md.md)] 不会在身份验证中使用客户端证书。No client certificates are used in the authentication. 身份验证期间，不会检查证书吊销列表。The certificate revocation list is not checked during authentication. 为 `targetHost` 指定的值必须与服务器证书上的名称匹配。The value specified for `targetHost` must match the name on the server's certificate. 异步身份验证操作必须通过调用 方法完成。The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常，方法由 `asyncCallback` 委托调用。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 操作完成时，此方法不会被阻止。This method does not block while the operation completes. 若要在操作完成之前一直阻止，请使用 方法重载之一。To block until the operation completes, use one of the method overloads. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[以异步方式调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 如果收到 ，此 将不再可用。If you receive a , this is no longer useable. 你应关闭此对象并删除对它的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以收集它。You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector.

span.span: Begins an asynchronous read operation that reads data from the stream and stores it in the specified array.

returns.span: 一个指示异步操作状态的 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果启用了加密和或签名，则读取操作将从基础流中读取数据，检查数据的完整性，并/或对其进行解密。If encryption and or signing are enabled, the read operation reads the data from the underlying stream, checks the integrity of the data, and/or decrypts it. 异步读取操作必须通过调用 方法完成。The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常，方法由 `asyncCallback` 委托调用。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 操作完成时，此方法不会被阻止。This method does not block while the operation completes. 若要在操作完成之前一直阻止，请使用 方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[以异步方式调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 类不支持多个同时读取操作。The class does not support multiple simultaneous read operations. 在成功完成身份验证之前，你无法调用此方法。You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated. 若要进行身份验证，请调用 之一，或者 、 方法。To authenticate call one of the , or , , methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何启动异步读取操作。The following code example demonstrates starting an asynchronous read operation.
